name: 15-Min FX Bollinger Squeeze Reversion
description: Intraday mean-reversion system for major FX pairs that fades volatility-compression breakouts on 15-minute bars. A trade is taken when Bollinger Band width is extremely tight (<0.8 % of ATR14) and price breaks the prior bar’s high/low; position is opened opposite the breakout direction if RSI14 has just left an extreme (oversold for longs, overbought for shorts). Risk is strictly capped to 1 % of equity through fixed-fractional sizing and a 1 ATR initial stop. Profit exits at 1.5 ATR or a trailing 1 ATR stop, whichever occurs first.
